title: Energy Boost Aromatherapy Bath Bomb
description: Latika's aromatherapy collection is made with 100% pure essential oils for a highly beneficial and aromatic bath experience. · ultra-moisturizing · made without artificial color or fragrance · aromatherapy- made with 100% pure essential oils · aromatherapy is based on the usage of aromatic materials such as essential oils, to promote health and well-being. · these bath bombs are made without artificial color or fragrance and contain herbal or clay additives along with essential oils. · this indulgent, ultra-moisturizing bath bomb will leave your skin soft and glowing, and your tub mess-free! 100% pure essential oils- lemongrass & spearmint
